Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Acid
    Acid tiles kill a character when they move onto it if they do not have a hazmat suit.
    AlertBox
    Prompts the user for a boolean answer to a question.
    Cell
    The Cell class is an abstract class of the cells that will be used in levels
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Character
    AN instance of Character will hold any data about a character, including it's state, it's coordiantes on the map and it's inventory.
    Collectable
    The Collectable class is an abstract class of the collectables that will be used in levels.
    ColouredDoor
    Characters will be stopped from moving onto a Coloured Door tile if it is closed and they do not have a keycard of the correct colour.
    ConfirmBox
    Creates an interactive window that the user can use
    Creation Date: 28/11/19.
    Door
    Characters will be stopped from moving onto a Door tile if it is closed and they do not meet the conditions to open it.
    DumbTargetingEnemy
    This is a DumbTargetingEnemy class which is used to create an enemy that is able to follow the player but, gets stuck easily.
    Enemy
    The Enemy class is an abstract class of the enemies that will be used in levels
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Energy
    Energy is collected by the character, having enough will allow the character to open powered doors.
    FileReader
    This class is responsible for reading level files and writing the save file when the game is saved.
    Floor
    Characters will collect any Collectables on a floor tile they move on if there is one.
    Game
    The Game Class will deal with the construction of, running of and the changes in between levels of the game.
    GameMenuController
    Controls the in-game menu.
    Goal
    Goal tiles will make the character win when they move onto it.
    Hazard
    Characters will die if they do not have a specific collectable when moving onto a hazard.
    HazmatSuit
    Hazmat Suits will prevent the character from getting killed when they move onto acid tiles.
    InGameMenu  
    KeyCard
    KeyCards are collected by the character, they will match with a coloured door based on colour and will let the character open them if collected..
    LeaderBoard
    This class is responsible for retrieving the scores from each UserProfile and constructing a descending leaderboard.
    LeaderBoardController  
    Level
    The Level Class will hold any and all information for a Level being played in the game.
    LevelSelector  
    Main
    Starts the game Menu.
    MainMenuController
    Controls the main menu displayed when first loaded.
    MessageOfTheDay
    Retrieves the message of the day from the API by solving the puzzles given in the API
    Creation Date: 25/11/19.
    Node
    This is a Node class which is used to create a Linked list of nodes inside the SmartTargetingEnemy Class
    Creation Date: 25/11/19.
    PoweredDoor
    Characters will be stopped from moving onto a Powered Door tile if it is closed and they do not have enough energy to open it.
    ReadLevelInfo
    Processes the information about a level and constructs a Level object.
    RubberBoots
    Rubber Boots will prevent the character from getting killed when they move onto tiles of wires.
    SmartTargetingEnemy
    This is a SmartTargetingEnemy class which is used to create an enemy that correctly follows the character around the map.
    StraightLineEnemy
    This is a SmartTargetingEnemy class which is used to create an enemy that is able to only move in a straight line, either horizontally or vertically.
    Teleporter
    Characters will be teleported when they move onto a teleporter tile.
    Treasure
    Treasure is collected by the character, this allowes the character to get a higher score.
    UserProfile  
    UserProfileMenu
    Controls the User Profile Selection menu.
    Wall
    Characters and enemies are not allowed to walk onto Wall tiles.
    WallFollowingEnemy
    This is a WallFollowingEnemy class which is used to create an enemy that will only follow walls on either its left or right.
    Wires
    Any 'Wires' tile will kill a character when they move onto it if they do not have rubber boots.
